CustomField.formula: IF(SatisfactionIndexCtrl__c <= 5, IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.SmileyRed.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.SmileyRed.AlternateText__c, 30, 30), IF(SatisfactionIndexCtrl__c <= 8, IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.SmileyYellow.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.SmileyYellow.AlternateText__c, 30, 30), IMAGE(IF($User.UITheme='Theme3', '/sfsites/c', '') & $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.SmileyGreen.URL__c, $CustomMetadata.HDT_ImageURL__mdt.SmileyGreen.AlternateText__c, 30, 30) ) ) & " " & TEXT( DAY(PraxidiaUpdateDate__c) ) & "/" & TEXT(MONTH(PraxidiaUpdateDate__c) ) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR(PraxidiaUpdateDate__c) )
CustomField.label: Satisfaction index (survey)
